Pre-Game Insights: The Boston Celtics host the Golden State Warriors in a non-conference matchup.
Boston finished 64-18 overall last season while going 37-4 at home.
The Celtics averaged 120.6 points per game while shooting 48.7% from the field and 38.8% from deep last season.
Golden State finished 46-36 overall with a 25-16 record on the road last season.
The Warriors gave up 115.2 points per game while committing 19.5 fouls last season.
Injuries for the Celtics include Kristaps Porzingis (out with a foot injury) and Jaylen Brown (day to day with a hip injury).
Injuries for the Warriors include De'Anthony Melton (day to day with a facet injury).
